title: 📂➜🗑️😔 Delete Individual Files
content:
git clone https://github.com/judigot/<repositoryName> .
git rm file.txt
git commit -m "Delete"
git push origin
git status

title: 📂📂📂📂➜🗑️😢 Delete All Files
content:
git clone https://github.com/judigot/<repositoryName> .
git rm -r *
git commit -m "Delete"
git push origin
git status
